attributes.action: To resign as he is a waste of space, just like Tony Blair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think Gordon Brown is a waste of space, just like Tony Blair.
If, as he implied, he wanted to be different, he would listen to the people (all he listens to is himself), but hey, all polititians are liars.

Prove me wrong!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
